• Microorganisms are divided into four major groups namely bacteria,fungi,virus and protozoa.
  • These microbes are found in air, water, food and in the bodies of plants and animals
  • They are useful for commercial production of medicine and alcohol.
  • They also cause a number of diseases like Tuberculosis,Malaria,Cholera,Food poisioning etc.
  • Various types of preservatives are used to control the growth of microorganisms namely salt,edible oil.etc
  • Microoraganisms also increase the fertility of the soil.
  • Some bacteria and blue green algae present in the soil fix nitrogen from the atmosphere and convert it into nitrogenous compounds.
